## stylesFactory() function

### stylesFactory() function

Creates memoized version of styles creator

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export declare function stylesFactory<ResultFn extends (this: any, ...newArgs: any[]) => ReturnType<ResultFn>>(stylesCreator: ResultFn): ResultFn;
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { stylesFactory } from '@grafana/ui';
```
<b>Parameters</b>

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  stylesCreator | <code>ResultFn</code> | function accepting dependencies based on which styles are created |
